title: Chicken with a Leek and Bacon Creamy Sauce
ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts', '3 leeks, sliced and washed', '1 packet unsmoked back bacon, cut up into bite size pieces', '300ml single cream', '80g flour', '80g butter', '300ml semi skimmed milk', 'a knob of butter for frying', '300g mature cheddar cheese, grated', 'salt and pepper to taste']
